posts.name: Gabe Morton
posts.cooked: Has it been announced who will be the teams testing the new control system?
IIRC, the form said the email provided when applying will be contacted if the applying team is selected.

posts.name: Jeremy Reed
posts.cooked: Yeah, the form indicated that we should hear back from them by 5/23, but I haven't received any updates yet.
"I don't think anyone has heard yet."

It has not been time-based. I am guessing that after filling out the form when the first blog post was released and then again when the updated version was released, they are evaluating their responses.

posts.name: FrankJ
posts.cooked: The development team is busy; they often fall behind on later testing goals. I don’t read too much into it now. Or patience, young grasshopper.

posts.name: Dominick Ferone
posts.cooked: The email you sent contained an attachment named "image.png".

posts.name: dpolito
posts.cooked:
Some emails have been sent out. Teams chosen for the first wave Alpha testing will be released shortly via the FIRST Blog. Teams are welcome to follow along with the Alpha testing process in this GitHub project. Dave Polito  
TC Titans #3767
